alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 08 at 3:20AM PST until November 08 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, San Luis Obispo County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall accumulations up to 4 inches are possible on the higher mountains peaks above 6000 feet in the Santa Barbara County mountains with this storm. A dusting to a half inch of snowfall is possible down to 3500 feet late tonight and into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains
